Mahmoud Mukhtar ( Arabic ) (Mee 10, 1891 ruo Maachị 28, 1934) bụ onye Ijipt na-akpụ ihe
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ nke Fine Arts na Cairo mgbe Prince Yusuf Kamal meghere ya n'afọ 1908, ma bụrụ akụkụ nke "Pioneers" mbụ nke mmegharị nka nke Ijipt
N'agbanyeghị ọnwụ ya n'oge, o nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu na mmezu na nhazi nke nka Ijipt nke oge a
A na-ekwenye na ọrụ ya na-egosi mmalite nke mmegharị oge a nke ndị Ijipt, a na-akpọkarị ya nna nke ihe ọkpụkpụ Ijipt nke oge a.
A mụrụ ya na Delta Nile n'otu obere obodo a na-akpọ Douar skouila, na mpaghara Mahalla al-Kubra, n'obodo Tanbara, ebe nna ya bụ onye isi obodo ('Omda)
Mukhtar kwagara Cairo mgbe ọ bụ nwata ya na nne ya, na 1908 sonyeere ụlọ akwụkwọ Egypt School of Fine Arts.
N'afọ 1912, ọ sonyeere studio nke Jules Coutan na École des Beaux-Arts na Paris
Ọ nọrọ na Paris site na Agha Ụwa nke Mbụ, emesịa bụrụ onye ọrụ na Musée Grévin n'okpuru nduzi nke onye nkụzi ya mbụ bụ Guillaume Laplagne
N'ike mmụọ nsọ nke mgbanwe ndị Ijipt nke 1919 ọ kpụrụ obere maquette nke ọrụ a na-akpọ "Nadhat Misr" ["Egypt's Awakening" ma ọ bụ "Egypt's Renaissance" na Bekee)

N'inweta nlebara anya nke ndị na-eto eto na-eme mgbanwe n'Ijipt, a malitere mkpọsa mba iji wuo nsụgharị dị egwu, nke mere ka e nwee emume ikpughe ọrụ ahụ na Cairo's Bab al-Hadid Square n'èzí isi ọdụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè Cairo
E mechara kwaga ihe oyiyi ahụ n'otu ebe dị na mpụga Mahadum Cairo.
Mukhtar Museum dị na Cairo nwere ọrụ Mahmoud Mokhtar na mgbasa ozi dị iche iche.
Otu Google Doodle na 10 Mee afọ 2012 mere ncheta ọmụmụ Mokhtar nke afọ 121.
